name: Prinvolt
description:
First actual game  attempt with Godot for the Godot Wild Jam 22! 

The idea was that an old mistreated printer from a office comes to life in revenge for all the hits it received for being faulty, and in the end it would lead to the old trope of machine revolution

Spent the whole jam learning the basics from the engine so I couldn't make any substancial content... At least I managed to implent most of the mecanics I had in mind... Hold X for 3 sec to see what I spended most of the time with!
